# thecloud_security_group (Resource)

Security Group resource allows you to manage virtual firewalls.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "thecloud_vpc" "main" {
  name = "main-vpc"
}

resource "thecloud_security_group" "web" {
  name        = "web-firewall"
  description = "Allow HTTP and HTTPS"
  vpc_id      = thecloud_vpc.main.id
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the security group.
- `vpc_id` (String) The ID of the VPC this security group belongs to.

### Optional

- `description` (String) The description of the security group.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the security group.
